name: Air Genasi
age: Genasi mature at about the same rate as humans and reach adulthood in their late teens. They live somewhat longer than humans do, up to 120 years.
alignment: Genasi tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

traits.Unending Breath: You can hold your breath indefinitely while youâ€™re not incapacitated.
traits.Mingle with the Wind: You can cast the levitate spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.
